name: Ockham's Razor
description:
The game begins in some strange facilites. Suddenly you hear a voice giving you some instructions and asking you to complete a series of tests that seem to follow some kind of logic.

Is up to you to discover the keys to solve all the tests and escape from this place.

We suggest to play with mouse and keyboard (other inputs are not implemented).

Controls

Move - WASD 

Activate switches - E

Jump - Spacebar

Sprint - Shift

Grab stuff - Hold right click

Shoot stuff - Right click when holding stuff.

PAUSE MENU - Escape

Game developed in a GameJam in 2019.

Done by:

Game design, script and programming -Javier Creis (@CreisJavier)

Sound effects and design - Luna Sampedro (@Luna_sampedro)

VFX and programming - Laura Blanco (@TheMercuryLady)
